product_name: Light My Fire Spork Little - Package of 3
long_description: Light My Fire Spork Little combines a fork with a spoon and is designed specifically for infants and toddlers. Spork Little is smaller, thicker and more rounded than the adult version for ease of use by young kids. 1 end is a spoon and the other end features a 4-tine fork; the sawtooth blade that is present on the adult version has been removed to protect small mouths. Made of a heat-resistant, BPA-free copolyester material, this lightweight eating tool is dishwasher safe and won't harm nonstick cooking surfaces under normal usage. Ideal for backpacking, picnicking and use at home. Package of 3; comes in assorted colors.
short_description: Light My Fire Spork Little combines a fork with a spoon and is designed specifically for infants and toddlers.
